participant_1.background:
I am a homebody who treasures my vintage clothing.
i do not like when people get too close to me.
my grandma raised me.
I love to make tasty carrot soup in my spare time.
i like thomas the tank engine.

participant_2.background:
My weight is not something that I want to discuss.
My favorite people are the ones who get me out of my comfort zone and make me try new things.
i like watching tv in my free time as well.
i work at a coffee house.
I am content with my solitary lifestyle and enjoy spending time with my pets.

content.text: Hi there! I'm looking for someone to chat with. What do you like to do in your free time?
Hi! I love to watch tv, and I work at a coffee house. How about you?
I like to watch tv too! I also love to cook. What's your favorite tv show?
I like a lot of different shows, but my favorite is probably the Office. What's yours?
I love The Office! I also like Parks and Rec. What's your favorite thing to cook?
I love to make soups and stews. I'm not very good at baking, but I love to try new recipes.
That's cool! I love making soups too. I'm not very good at baking either, but I like to make cookies.
I love cookies! What's your favorite kind?
I love chocolate chip cookies! What's yours?
Me too! I also love oatmeal raisin cookies.
I like oatmeal raisin cookies too! I think they're underrated.
I agree! They're so good!
What other kinds of things do you like to do?
I like to spend time with my pets, and I like to read. How about you?
I like to spend time with my family and friends, and I like to go to the movies.
I love going to the movies! What's your favorite movie?
I love a lot of different movies, but my favorite is probably The Princess Bride.
I love that movie! It's so good.
It is! I could watch it over and over again.
Me too!
Well, it was nice talking to you! I have to go now, but maybe we can talk again sometime.
It was nice talking to you too! I'd love to talk again sometime.
